span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vi. 反对： to voice opposition; object
【例】 demur at the suggestion 反对提议
【近】 challenge, exception, expostulation, fuss, kick, protest抗议；断言, remonstrance, stink讨厌的人;使发出臭气
【反】 accept, accede 接受
【考法 2】 n. 犹豫： hesitation (as in doing or accepting) usually based on doubt of the acceptability of something offered or proposed; qualm
【例】 we accepted his offer to pay for our dinners without demur 我们毫不犹豫地同意了他买单
【记】 de否定 + murmur 咕哝, 怨言；咕哝地抱怨表示否定，反对
